title.rendered: THE NEW MONEY GREEN FASHION TREND

content.rendered:
THE NEW MONEY GREEN FASHION TREND

The color of the year is this beautiful money bright green color that will make you stand out from any crowd. This season it’s all about color, bold tops, crystals, and our new obsession…..the new French designer Jacquemus bags. JACQUEMUS.COM. His bags are selling out like hotcakes all over the world. If you see one that you love in stock get it quickly because most of them are highly coveted and are considered a collector’s item in the fashion world.

Bags, green top, and pants are available on FWRD.COM , JACQUEMUS.COM.

P.S. Get your lashes ready for Mother’s Day and Memorial Day weekend! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). 3: Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here.  

LOVE DIONNE
